Summary: China detains principal over lead poisoning of 200 children . More than 200 children in northwestern China fell ill with potential lead poisoning from date cakes and corn rolls . Investigators found “abnormal’s levels of lead in the blood of children .

Title: Bye-election: Ibadan North residents demand transparent APC primaries, reject imposition plans
Summary: Concerned residents and stakeholders of Ibadan North have raised concerns over alleged attempts to impose a candidate in the upcoming APC primaries . They have called for a transparent and democratic process that reflects the will of the people .

Title: IPOB rejects Umahi’s claim of negotiation for Kanu’s release
Summary: The Indigenous People of Biafra (IPOB) strongly rejects recent claims by the Minister of Works, David Umahi, that negotiations are ongoing for the release of its detained leader, Mazi Nnamdi Kanu .

Title: Newcastle agree £55m fee for Forest’s Elanga

Title: Pan-Igbo group backs creation of Anioma State
Summary: Ndi Asuu Bia Social Cultural Organization has formally declared its support for the creation of Anioma State . The group submitted a memorandum to the Senate Committee on the Review of the 1999 Constitution .
